ygData.subject: The Brotherhood

(I've been informed Unicron was hit with around ten missiles, which I was not 
aware of.  I thought the number was considerably less.  Therefore I'll add 
the damage to Unicron now.

Another thing, please excuse JP of anything rash at the Ramora.  He doesn't 
know the defenses and I didn't make a list so there's nothing for him to go 
on so he's kind of in the blue)
 
Vehement/Unicron/Sun Crusher/Reflector:


Unicron didn't wait for the heathens he had fired upon to respond and blasted 
full speed for the Ramora and slightly smiled as scanners detected incoming 
objects.  He sent orders quickly two the two robots not under fire under his 
command.  He raised an arm, launching off a missile on an intercept course 
with one of the missiles heading for him.

The movement of his arm slightly tore open a badly damaged piece of armor 
that began trickling a light amount of green mech-fluid.  Unicron was in 
pain, but didn't show it.  He knew it would affect his followers.  After all, 
what kind of god feels pain?  He was a foot from the shields and could feel 
the intense heat, a square large enough to fit him (barely) in the shield 
opening up.  The ancient being passed through the hole, his followers in 
close pursuit.

The Chaos-Bringer would've sighed if he could.  He had not powered up since 
he had been revived and upgraded his loyal followers.  He had not powered up 
since he had taken possession of their bodies and aided Unitron in his 
near-death experience.  He needed to rest, and the heathens wouldn't stop him.
---

Vehement had used his access codes to override Hell Beast and make the 
relatively small hole in the shield, and Vehement knew that Hell Beast could 
not defeat the codes without extensive attempts to break a code based on a 
long forgotten language that only existed in Brotherhood dogma.

Three objects headed for him as he was a few feet from Unicron's feet, firing 
off two optic blasts at two of the incoming plasma blasts.

---

Sun Crusher fired off a five rapid optic blasts in a streak, three heading 
for the last plasma blast, one for a missile, the other for another missile.

---

Reflector watched Unicron pass through the hole in the shield and Vehement 
almost completely pass through the shield right behind the supposed diety.  
Raising his right wrist and launching two missiles from the double-barreled 
cannon attached to that appendage, two energy-signature seeking missiles 
streaked out and split into seperate directions, one heading for Supernova 
and the other Vcyir.
